1_19bxeaAV3CdRCr8BegmEXTqwhV15EabmS2.body: There's a special software for that purpose: Retroshare. It allows you to set up private P2P sharing network (between friends only).

1511719880_1F8omDpXyPsBfd9CBJ91o4Wv1AA2K.body: hash reversal as a service (recovering password from, for example, MD4 hash)

> [akito](#comment_387_1F8omDpXyPsBfd9CBJ91o4Wv1AA2KxqMEY): MD5 is already deprecated, so I doubt anyone uses MD4 at all.

MD4 is used to store passwords of user accounts in all versions of Windows: NT 4.0, 2000, XP, Vista, 7, 8.1 and 10 (including latest versions).
